developer: Jaedraze aka General Jimbobbityboo of Secret Universal Services Society
content: Our main goal is to provide a comprehensive assistant platform for colonists in the Entropia system, offering a range of tools, information, and resources to enrich their gaming experience. While our current focus is on Planet Arkadia, we intend to gradually expand to include content regarding other planets and celestial bodies within Entropia Universe.
points: I've added a YouTube embed for music. Scroll down to learn more!
